movies.title: Gold
movies.plot: Kenny Wells, a modern-day prospector, hustler, and dreamer, is desperate for a lucky break. Left with few options, Wells teams up with an equally luckless geologist to execute a grandiose, last-ditch effort: to find gold deep in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

events.title: a deal is made to exploit the site of a large gold deposit
Mike dies after falling from a helicopter
